name: google-image-search
title: Google Image Search
description: This extension uses the Google API to search for images
author: krod12

commands.name: google-search-images
commands.title: Google Search Images
commands.description: Search images using the Google API and download or copy them

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Google API Key
preferences.description: Your Google API key for the Custom Search JSON API
preferences.placeholder: Please enter your API token here

preferences.name: searchEngineId
preferences.title: Search Engine ID
preferences.description: Your Google Custom Search Engine ID (cx parameter)
preferences.placeholder: Please enter your API key here
